title: 'Never recommend HP monitor (M24f)'
body: 'I will never recommend HP monitor (M24f)
column5: especially for graphic and video editing work.  After using it for a year
column6: a line suddenly appeared on my monitor. After complaining to HP call support
column7: a total of 3 monitors were replaced
column8: including one old and two new monitors.  Monitors that are replaced under warranty are supposed to be new
column9: but HP first tried to repair the old monitor. After complaining again
column11: and both of them had screen bleed and excessive IPS glow issues.  It has been two months since the complaint for monitor replacement
column12: but no concrete steps have been taken by HP. In fact
column13: there has been no response from HP for almost a month.'

title: 'Pasting between back panel and front opened within a month'
body: The product quality is really bad. The glue holding the front and back panels together started coming off within just 30 days of using it. Customers expect good quality from HP, whether it's the physical parts or the screen. Unfortunately, HP didn't meet these expectations.
